title: Springfield Armory National Historic Site: Park Home
body: Forging Arms for the Nation  For nearly two centuries, the US Armed Forces and American industry looked to Springfield Armory for innovative engineering and superior firearms. Springfield Armory National Historic Site commemorates the critical role of the nationâ€™s first armory by preserving and interpreting the world's largest historic US military small arms collection, along with historic archives, buildings, and landscapes.                A world renowned collection    Explore our amazing collection of historic firearms.        Find a Special Event   The Armory offers a number of special events including Armory Day, Big Band, Concerts, and the Big E!
